name: Ludum Dare 37 - Time Equals Size
description:
I didn't get to submit an entry to the last LD because I was trying something new which was doing it in c++ with some libraries. LD35 I used Unity, but this time I really wanted to finish in time and submit something. Halfway through I thought I wasn't going to make it so I a gave up, but this afternoon I powered through and made it. It's not as great as I thought it would be, and has lots of issues and other ideas I'd like to have implemented but oh well.

\\Programs used//

Microsoft Visual Studio

Paint.net

Evernote

Spotify (For the jams (not the game))

(Details in the README.txt)

Thanks for another great Ludum Dare!!!
